localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.
blogPost.body: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.
blogPost.title: Rent the Backyard - Add a backyard home to rent, host your family, or work from
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 租后院为人们建造后院房屋，用于安置家人，作为家庭办公室或出租以获得额外收入。这个过程快至12周，（2周在您的后院）。环保的技术和软件让我们的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一个后院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或从工作。

localize.description: 租後院爲人們建造後院房屋，用於安置家人，作爲家庭辦公室或出租以獲得額外收入。這個過程快至12周，（2周在您的後院）。環保的技術和軟件讓我們的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一個後院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或從工作。

previous.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
previous.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。

next.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
next.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site

localize.description: 你一直在寻找的包，使你的网站或应用程序到一个新的水平。该包包含100个动画图标，以svg格式渲染，准备集成到您的网站。该包将定期更新新版本的图标，以满足您的所有需求。
localize.tagline: Svg动画图标包，可以整合到您的网站上。

localize.description: 你一直在尋找的包，使你的網站或應用程序到一個新的水平。該包包含100個動畫圖標，以svg格式渲染，準備集成到您的網站。該包將定期更新新版本的圖標，以滿足您的所有需求。
localize.tagline: Svg動畫圖標包，可以整合到您的網站上。
